content: Hey folks-- not sure who to ping here-- are there any updates that would concern the lang team? We are holding monthly planning meetings now and I'm seeking active updates from project groups and things. Maybe someone can post an update to rust-lang/lang-team#22 sometime before 2021-04-07T13:00:00-04:00 ? Here are some questions to consider.
That message came 17h before the deadline given in the message -- sorry for not responding earlier, but there's no way I can promise such fast reaction times.^^
(I generally have not much Rust time outside weekends, so typical latency will be "until the next weekend". Some weekends are booked with other stuff, in which case things get delayed another week.)
(The planning meeting was delayed a week - we're trying to work on getting updates requested earlier :)
